headline: Why Albemarle (ALB) Dipped More Than Broader Market Today

headline: Zacks Investment Ideas feature highlights: REMX, ALB, SGML and LAR
summary: REMX signals a fresh breakout as rare earth stocks regain momentum after consolidation, fueled by geopolitics, AI demand and supply-chain risks.
